data.text: “Dze konyifaha aɖe gɔme, eye nàgblɔ be,
“ ‘Dzatanɔ kae dawò nye le dzatawo dome?
Ehe viawo dometɔ ɖeka wòtsi hezu dzata sesẽ aɖe.
Dukɔwo se eŋkɔ ɖe do nɛ, wòge ɖe eme,
“ ‘Esi dzatanɔ la kpɔ be yeƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ medze edzi o la,
Enɔ dzatawo dome, elabena ezu dzata sesẽ aɖe azɔ.
Egbã woƒe mɔ sesẽwo ƒu anyi,
Tete dukɔ siwo tso nuto ma
Wode ga ŋɔtime nɛ, hee ɖade gaxadza me,
“ ‘Dawò nɔ abe wainti ene le wò wainbɔ me.
Eƒe alɔwo sẽ, eye wonyo woatsɔ awɔ fiatikplɔ.
Ke wotsoe ƒu anyi le dɔmedzoe me.
Dzo bi, kaka tso eƒe alɔ gã ɖeka me,
